#labels Phase-Deploy
General information about the RICH project.

= Introduction =

RICH is a c++ code that solves the equations of newtonian compressible hydrodynamics on a moving mesh. It was written as part of our PhD research under the supervision of Professor Re'em Sari. The acronym stands for Racah Institute computational Hydrodynamics.
